00025 int Output :: write(GeneratorPtr gen, double dur, char* fp, int fileFormat)
00026 {
00027 
00028         // char* outfilename="/Volumes/xdisc/_sync/_x/src/arachneWarp/out/foo.wav";
00029     // should determine file format by file extension
00030 
00031     // sample format is indepedent of System settings
00032 
00033         int unsigned format = fileFormat;
00034         int unsigned channels;
00035 
00036     if (gen->getGeneratorType() == aw::gTypeMono) {
00037         channels = 1;
00038     }
00039     else { // a gTypePoly
00040         channels = 2;
00041     }    
00042 
00043         SndfileHandle outfile(fp, SFM_WRITE, format, channels, 
00044                           sys_->getSamplingRate());
00045         if (not outfile) return -1;
00046         // create an array of the necessary size based on sampling rate and dur
00047         const unsigned int sampleCount = sys_->getSamplingRate() * dur;
00048 
00049 
00050     // must declare sample array within scope of each branch
00051     if (gen->getGeneratorType() == aw::gTypeMono) {
00052 
00053         const unsigned int size = sampleCount;
00054         float sample[size];
00055 
00056         for (int i=0; i<sampleCount; i++) {
00057             sample[i] = gen->getValueAtSample(i);
00058         }
00059         outfile.write(&sample[0], size);
00060     }
00061     else {
00062         // interleaved, twice as large
00063         const unsigned int size = sampleCount * 2; 
00064         float sample[size];
00065 
00066         double* outPoly;
00067         for (int i=0; i<sampleCount; i++) {
00068             outPoly = gen->getPolyAtSample(i);
00069             sample[2*i] = outPoly[0];
00070             sample[(2*i)+1] = outPoly[1];
00071         }
00072         outfile.write(&sample[0], size);
00073     }
00074 
00075 
00076     return 0;
00077 
00078 }
